title: Toyota 7FBCU15 2,750 lb Capacity Electric Forklift
item_description:
Toyota 7FBCU15 2,750 lb Capacity Electric Forklift

Note: Forklift has been reserved by Auctioneer and will be available for pickup by appointment only on Wednesday, July 23rd, 2025, from 9:00 AM to 3:30 PM. This unit will be used during the removal period, therefore the hours below are an approximate guideline.

  • Manufacturer: Toyota
  • Model: 7FBCU15
  • Load Capacity: 2,750 lb
  • Fuel Type: Electric
  • Mast Type: Two Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 4387.6
  • Serial Number: 61570
  • Overall Width: 36”
  • Overall Length: 140”
  • Overall Height: 87”
  • Truck Weight: 6,710 lb
  • Tread Width: 5”
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Front Tire Size: 18x6x12 1/8
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Rear Tire Size: 14x4 1/2x8
  • Maximum Lift Height: 131”
  • Fork Length: 60”
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Features: Side Shift Tilt
